Question: This person was reported to be a fan of the game Diplomacy, which was John F Kennedy's and Henry Kissinger's favorite game.
Hints: Occupying 293 linear feet (almost 90 metres) of shelf space, the papers document this person's journalism career.
CBS cut abruptly from the report at 6:38 pm Eastern Standard Time to this person, who was still speaking to Johnson on the phone.
This person was a vocal advocate for free airtime for political candidates.
